front.title: LDAP API Extensions for Sort and Simple Paged Results

abstract.t: This document defines extensions to the LDAP v3 C language API defined in [1]. These extensions cover the sort extended control, defined in [2], and the simple paged results control, defined in [3]. N.B.: while the sort extended control can be used on its own, the simple paged results control is most useful when used on results that have already been sorted.
